tag.name: tabs
tag.example: <html:tabs> <html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-tab active="true" label="my tab 1" id="tab1"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 2" id="tab2"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 3" id="tab3"></html:tabs-tab> </html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-body> <html:tabs-content active="true" contentOf="tab1"> My content 1</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab2"> My content 2</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab3"> My content 3</html:tabs-content> </html:tabs-body> </html:tabs>

tag.name: tabs-header
tag.example: <html:tabs> <html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-tab active="true" label="my tab 1" id="tab1"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 2" id="tab2"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 3" id="tab3"></html:tabs-tab> </html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-body> <html:tabs-content active="true" contentOf="tab1"> My content 1</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab2"> My content 2</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab3"> My content 3</html:tabs-content> </html:tabs-body> </html:tabs>

tag.name: tabs-body
tag.example: <html:tabs> <html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-tab active="true" label="my tab 1" id="tab1"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 2" id="tab2"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 3" id="tab3"></html:tabs-tab> </html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-body> <html:tabs-content active="true" contentOf="tab1"> My content 1</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab2"> My content 2</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab3"> My content 3</html:tabs-content> </html:tabs-body> </html:tabs>

tag.name: tabs-content

attribute.description: It indicates whether the tab should be initiated selected
attribute.name: active

attribute.description: Indicates the link between tab head and content
attribute.name: contentOf

attribute.description: Indicates the url to be incorporated into the tab. If not indicated it renders content in the component body.
attribute.name: url

tag.example: <html:tabs> <html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-tab active="true" label="my tab 1" id="tab1"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 2" id="tab2"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 3" id="tab3"></html:tabs-tab> </html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-body> <html:tabs-content active="true" contentOf="tab1"> My content 1</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab2"> My content 2</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab3"> My content 3</html:tabs-content> </html:tabs-body> </html:tabs>

tag.name: tabs-tab

attribute.description: It indicates tab activation on load component
attribute.name: active

attribute.description: Indicates the label of the tab
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n) of the tab
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: It indicates whether the tab should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates whether the tab should be recharged to clicar.Default: true.
attribute.name: reloadOnSelect

tag.example: <html:tabs> <html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-tab active="true" label="my tab 1" id="tab1"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 2" id="tab2"></html:tabs-tab> <html:tabs-tab label="my tab 3" id="tab3"></html:tabs-tab> </html:tabs-header> <html:tabs-body> <html:tabs-content active="true" contentOf="tab1"> My content 1</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab2"> My content 2</html:tabs-content> <html:tabs-content contentOf="tab3"> My content 3</html:tabs-content> </html:tabs-body> </html:tabs>
